title: Hour 1 : Spooky Season?
description:
In this episode Dan Orlovsky, Michael "Playmaker" Irvin, and Ryan Clark talks about the issues Aaron Rodgers and the Green Bay Packers are facing as a team. What can they do to rise above and become the successful Green Bay Packers we once knew? Of course Michael "Playmaker" Irvin has to talk about his Cowboys, but what changes at the run game do they need to make to really show how dominate this offense can be? Last but not least, who do you see rising above and clinching the NFC South?
